response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 to us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and the time and effort invested into its creation. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or operations, enhancing your experience or productivity significantly. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we're extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $11,000. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 11000}
